_metadata.description: Known WebView2 feature flags and browser arguments with risk/impact annotations. When found in ETL traces or app config, these provide context for diagnosis. Source: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/webview2/concepts/webview-features-flags

IsEdgeWebViewCancelInitialNavigationEnab.description: Cancels the initial about:blank navigation to prevent suppressed NavigationCompleted
IsEdgeWebViewCancelInitialNavigationEnab.impact: When enabled, about:blank NavigationCompleted is cancelled rather than suppressed. Can prevent deadlocks in hosts that wait for NavigationCompleted.

msWebView2EnableAutoProfileDeletion.description: Automatically deletes user data folder profile on WebView2 close
msWebView2EnableAutoProfileDeletion.impact: Data loss risk — user data removed on each session end

msWebView2BrowserProcessExeOverride.description: Overrides the browser process executable path
msWebView2BrowserProcessExeOverride.impact: Custom browser process — may cause version mismatches or compatibility issues

msWebView2EnableTracing.description: Enables ETW tracing for WebView2 events
msWebView2EnableTracing.impact: Performance overhead from trace logging. Should be enabled for diagnostics only.

EdgeWebViewPersistUserDataOnMigration.description: Persists user data during WebView2 runtime migration/update
EdgeWebViewPersistUserDataOnMigration.impact: When disabled, user data may be lost during runtime updates

msWebView2BlockAllPACScripts.impact: Can break proxy authentication in corporate environments

msWebView2AllowSingleSignOnUsingOSPrimar.description: Allows SSO using the OS primary account
msWebView2AllowSingleSignOnUsingOSPrimar.impact: Enables or disables WAM-based SSO. When disabled, forces manual authentication.

msWebView2EnableDpiAwarenessDetection.description: Enables DPI awareness detection for the WebView2 process
msWebView2EnableDpiAwarenessDetection.impact: When enabled, WebView2 detects and adapts to DPI changes. When disabled, may cause scaling issues.

msWebView2DisableSmartscreen.impact: Removes malware/phishing protection. May speed up navigation but increases security risk.

msWebView2ChannelSearchKind.description: Controls which WebView2 runtime channel is used (Stable, Beta, Dev, Canary)
msWebView2ChannelSearchKind.impact: Using non-Stable channels may expose to runtime bugs and regressions

msWebView2ReleaseChannelPreference.description: Sets preference for release channel selection
msWebView2ReleaseChannelPreference.impact: Affects which runtime version is selected when multiple are available

msWebView2BrowserExecutableFolder.description: Sets the folder containing the WebView2 runtime/fixed version distribution
msWebView2BrowserExecutableFolder.impact: Used for Fixed Version deployment. Wrong path causes creation failure.

disable-gpu.description: Disables GPU hardware acceleration. If a software renderer isn't in place, the GPU process doesn't launch.
disable-gpu.impact: Prevents GPU crashes but may cause rendering performance degradation. Useful for diagnosing GPU-related blank pages.

disable-background-timer-throttling.description: Disables task throttling of timer tasks from background pages
disable-background-timer-throttling.impact: Background pages run at full speed. Higher CPU usage but prevents timer starvation in background WebViews.

no-sandbox.description: Disables the sandbox for all process types that are normally sandboxed
no-sandbox.impact: Critical security risk — removes process isolation. Only for testing. If seen in production traces, flag immediately.

RendererAppContainer.impact: When enabled, can crash Low Integrity Level (Low-IL) desktop apps due to missing capability SID. Known root cause of Bug 48452932.

disable-web-security.description: Disables cross-origin policy and doesn't enforce same-origin policy
disable-web-security.impact: Critical security risk — allows cross-origin requests. Website testing only.

disable-site-isolation-trials.impact: Reduces security isolation between sites. May affect cross-origin iframe behavior.

msWebViewAllowLocalNetworkAccessChecks.description: Enables Local Network Access security checks that restrict web content from public origins from accessing local/loopback resources
msWebViewAllowLocalNetworkAccessChecks.impact: When enabled, can break apps accessing local services. Known regression in WV2 143 (LNA permission change).

BlockInsecurePrivateNetworkRequests.description: Blocks private network requests from non-secure contexts in public address space
BlockInsecurePrivateNetworkRequests.impact: Can break legitimate local network communication from WebView2 apps.

msEnhancedTrackingPreventionEnabled.description: Enables native privacy protection features such as blocking tracking cookies and requests
msEnhancedTrackingPreventionEnabled.impact: May break functionality on sites that rely on third-party cookies or tracking scripts.

sdsm-state.impact: Higher levels disable JIT compilation for security. Can significantly impact JavaScript performance.

msSmartScreenProtection.impact: Adds malware/phishing protection. May add latency to navigation due to URL checking.

proxy-server.description: Proxy server that overrides system settings (HTTP and HTTPS only)
proxy-server.impact: Overrides system proxy. Misconfiguration can cause all network requests to fail.

proxy-bypass-list.description: Hosts for which proxy settings are bypassed (comma-separated)
proxy-bypass-list.impact: Allows direct connections to specified hosts. Ignored unless --proxy-server is also set.

no-proxy-server.description: Overrides any other proxy server flags that are passed
no-proxy-server.impact: Forces direct connections, bypassing all proxy configuration.

allow-insecure-localhost.description: Allows TLS/SSL errors on localhost to be ignored
allow-insecure-localhost.impact: No interstitial for localhost cert errors. Useful for development but security risk in production.

ignore-certificate-errors.impact: Critical security risk — silently accepts invalid/expired/self-signed certs. Development only.

log-net-log.description: Enables saving net log events to a file for network debugging
log-net-log.impact: Captures detailed network activity. Useful for diagnosing TLS, proxy, and request failures.

net-log-capture-mode.description: Sets granularity of events in network log (Default/IncludeSensitive/Everything)
net-log-capture-mode.impact: IncludeSensitive and Everything modes capture auth tokens and cookies — privacy risk.

auto-open-devtools-for-tabs.description: Makes Edge WebView auto-open the DevTools window for each tab
auto-open-devtools-for-tabs.impact: DevTools open automatically. May trigger service worker force-update stall via CDP detach (CL 6619069).

remote-debugging-port.description: Enables remote debugging over HTTP on specified port
remote-debugging-port.impact: Opens debugging port — security risk if exposed. Used for automation and DevTools protocol access.

msEdgeDevToolsWdpRemoteDebugging.description: Enables remote debugging for WebView2 WinUI 2 (UWP) apps
msEdgeDevToolsWdpRemoteDebugging.impact: Enables WDP-based remote debugging for UWP-hosted WebView2.

enable-logging.description: Enable logging at the error level
enable-logging.impact: Adds error-level logging output. Minimal performance impact.

force-device-scale-factor.description: Overrides the device scale factor for browser UI and contents
force-device-scale-factor.impact: Forces specific DPI scaling. Useful for diagnosing DPI-related rendering issues.

embedded-browser-webview-dpi-awareness.description: Sets the DPI awareness level of server-side processes
embedded-browser-webview-dpi-awareness.impact: Controls DPI awareness for WebView2 browser process. Affects rendering on multi-monitor setups.

edge-webview-no-dpi-workaround.description: Disables the DPI awareness app compatibility shim workaround
edge-webview-no-dpi-workaround.impact: Stops launching browser process via shell to avoid inheriting app compat shim. May fix or break DPI handling.

msEnhancedTextContrast.description: Improves text contrast enhancement and gamma correction to match native Windows apps
msEnhancedTextContrast.impact: Font rendering respects ClearType Tuner settings. Visual improvement but may change text layout.

force-color-profile.description: Forces all monitors to use specified color profile (srgb/generic-rgb)
force-color-profile.impact: Overrides monitor color profiles. Useful for consistent rendering across displays.

msWebView2BrowserHitTransparent.description: Causes mouse/keyboard events to pass through WebView2 to underlying app
msWebView2BrowserHitTransparent.impact: Input events bypass WebView2. May cause app to crash or freeze. Related to transparent window scenarios.

msWebView2EnableDraggableRegions.description: Enables app-region: drag/nodrag CSS style for titlebar-like behavior
msWebView2EnableDraggableRegions.impact: Elements with app-region:drag behave like titlebars. Affects input handling on those elements.

block-new-web-contents.description: Makes all pop-ups and window.open calls fail when set to true
block-new-web-contents.impact: Blocks all new windows/tabs. May break sites that rely on popups for auth or payment flows.

msWebView2CancelInitialNavigation.description: Cancels the initial navigation in WebView2 to improve startup performance
msWebView2CancelInitialNavigation.impact: Skips about:blank navigation. Faster startup but may affect apps that depend on initial NavigationCompleted.

allow-file-access-from-files.description: Allows reading file:// URIs from other file:// URIs
allow-file-access-from-files.impact: Enables local file cross-referencing. Security risk if loading untrusted local content.

disk-cache-size.description: Forces maximum disk space for disk cache (in bytes)
disk-cache-size.impact: Limits cache size. Too small causes repeated network fetches; too large wastes disk. Relates to UDF bloat.

msWebView2CodeCache.description: Enables bytecode caching for JS resources loaded via SetVirtualHostNameToFolderMapping or WebResourceRequested
msWebView2CodeCache.impact: Speeds up 3rd+ loads of JS files. Increases disk usage but improves script execution time.

edge-webview-foreground-boost-opt-in.description: Opts-in to foreground priority boost for WebView2 processes
edge-webview-foreground-boost-opt-in.impact: WebView2 processes get higher scheduling priority when in foreground. May improve responsiveness.

edge-webview-foreground-boost-opt-out.impact: WebView2 processes do not get foreground boost. May reduce responsiveness but save CPU for host app.

msWebView2SimulateMemoryPressureWhenInac.description: Simulates memory pressure for inactive WebViews
msWebView2SimulateMemoryPressureWhenInac.impact: Forces memory reclamation when WebView is inactive. Reduces memory but may cause reloads when reactivated.

SpareRendererForSitePerProcess.description: Keeps a warm spare renderer process for the most recently requested BrowserContext
SpareRendererForSitePerProcess.impact: Faster navigation by pre-spawning renderer. Increases baseline memory usage.

js-flags.description: Passes flags to V8 JS engine (e.g., --scavenger_max_new_space_capacity_mb=8)
js-flags.impact: Controls V8 GC behavior. Lower scavenger limit = less memory, more frequent GC. Higher = more memory, less GC.

long-animation-frame-timing.description: Provides detailed timing for long animation frames exceeding 16.67ms (60fps)
long-animation-frame-timing.impact: Debugging aid for animation performance. Helps identify jank and bottlenecks.

msWebView2TreatAppSuspendAsDeviceSuspend.description: When all WebViews suspended, treats app as if device is suspended (pauses timers/tasks)
msWebView2TreatAppSuspendAsDeviceSuspend.impact: Aggressive power saving. All delayed tasks and timers paused. May cause unexpected behavior on resume.

allow-run-as-system.description: Bypasses check that prevents Edge WebView browser from running as System account
allow-run-as-system.impact: Allows running as SYSTEM — not recommended. May be needed for specific service scenarios.

incognito.description: Forces InPrivate (Incognito) mode even with user data directory specified
incognito.impact: No data persisted. Cookies, cache, history cleared on exit. Breaks SSO unless msAllowAmbientAuthInPrivateWebView2 also set.

msSingleSignOnForInPrivateWebView2.description: Enables browser-based SSO flow for InPrivate sessions
msSingleSignOnForInPrivateWebView2.impact: Allows SSO in InPrivate mode. Use with msAllowAmbientAuthInPrivateWebView2 for ambient auth.

msAllowAmbientAuthInPrivateWebView2.description: Enables SSO with default credential/ambient authentication flow in InPrivate mode
msAllowAmbientAuthInPrivateWebView2.impact: Must be used with msSingleSignOnForInPrivateWebView2. Enables automatic auth without user interaction.

msSingleSignOnOSForPrimaryAccountIsShare.description: Allows implicit sign-in to Microsoft webpages using any account via OS primary account info
msSingleSignOnOSForPrimaryAccountIsShare.impact: Broadens SSO to use OS-level account info for Microsoft webpages.

user-agent.description: Overrides the default user agent with a custom string
user-agent.impact: Changes User-Agent header. May break server-side detection or feature gating.

accept-lang.description: Specifies Accept-Language header sent to servers (format: language[-country])
accept-lang.impact: Overrides browser language for server content negotiation.

msWebView2EnableDownloadContentInWebReso.description: Allows download navigation responses to be available in WebResourceResponseReceived
msWebView2EnableDownloadContentInWebReso.impact: Enables intercepting download responses. Needed for custom download handling.

msWebView2TextureStream.description: Allows streaming captured/composed video frames to WebView2 for JS rendering
msWebView2TextureStream.impact: Enables texture streaming for media scenarios. Required for custom video composition pipelines.

msWebView2NativeEventDispatch.description: Uses native mojo connection for internal event dispatch (e.g., web messages to renderer)
msWebView2NativeEventDispatch.impact: Faster event dispatch path. May affect timing of WebMessage delivery.

msWebViewEdgeApplyWebResourceRequestedFi.description: Makes AddWebResourceRequestedFilter also apply to out-of-process iframes
msWebViewEdgeApplyWebResourceRequestedFi.impact: Extends WRR filtering to OOPIFs. Required for intercepting iframe network requests.

ThirdPartyStoragePartitioning.description: Enables partitioning of third-party storage (IndexedDB, CacheStorage) by top-level site
ThirdPartyStoragePartitioning.impact: Reduces fingerprinting but may break apps relying on shared third-party storage across sites.

PartitionedCookies.description: Enables sites to opt-in to having cookies partitioned by top-level site via Partitioned attribute
PartitionedCookies.impact: Partitioned cookies only sent when on same top-level site as when set. May break cross-site cookie flows.

isolate-origins.description: Requires dedicated processes for specified origins (comma-separated list)
isolate-origins.impact: Increases process count and memory but improves security isolation for specified origins.

edge-webview-is-background.description: Indicates that WebView is being launched in the background
edge-webview-is-background.impact: Affects process priority and resource allocation. Background WebViews may be throttled.

edge-webview-run-with-package-id.description: Runs WebView processes with package identity for bridged Desktop apps
edge-webview-run-with-package-id.impact: Affects Windows identity and capability resolution. Required for some MSIX scenarios.

do-not-de-elevate.description: Prevents de-elevation of WebView2 on launch
do-not-de-elevate.impact: Used after de-elevating to prevent infinite loops. Related to elevation/integrity level handling.
